attributes.action: To Let Teachers and Children have the COVID -19 vaccination
attributes.additional_details: It will get Children back to School quicker and will not spread the virus as much as what it did in the past.
attributes.background: I want the Government to let Teachers and Children have the COVID-19 vaccine as Teachers and children can go back to school as soon as possible.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316

Whether or not to offer vaccinations to children is a clincial decision
